name: Stickman Physics Simulator
description:
Stickman Physics Simulator is a new physics game that simulates a deadly fall from a terrible height with rough terrain. Have you ever thought of relaxing by playing torture games, watching the stickman break every part of his body and die narrowly? This is the game for you!

Falling is the fastest way to die! With characters that are famous superheroes with ultimate strength and a collection of top-notch supercars, this game promises to bring the ultimate experience to players.

Get momentum, hold, release, and push the stickman down from the highest ladder to create the greatest damage. Players can choose the pose of the character to create the most dangerous fall.

Game features:
- Superhero characters: Spiderman, Ironman, Batman, Venom...
- Various and interesting game maps: Straight line, Big stairs, Fun fans, Monster's Jaws, Pinball...
- Simple, delicate, beautiful graphics
- Harmonious, pleasant colors
- Lively and dramatic music, creating excitement for players
- Smooth game movement, high speed
